content.value:
Hi. I'm 25 years old. Sometimes I have to hold cups with two hands because my tremors get so bad I'll drop the cup if I don't. Often, I use two hands to hold a cup and still need assistance to drink from it.

When you punch down, you hit ppl like me.
content.html: Hi. I'm 25 years old. Sometimes I have to hold cups with two hands because my tremors get so bad I'll drop the cup if I don't. Often, I use two hands to hold a cup and still need assistance to drink from it. When you punch down, you hit ppl like me.
